resources.string: To use the weather feature, the Clock widget \'cLock\' has to be installed

An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Show in battery statistics unaccounted & over-counted usage.
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Find all of your CyanideL support needs inside
Download the latest Stable release of CyanideL
Download Shift Kernel, not all devices supported
Visit the Official support thread for your device
Fully packed with the majority of GAPPS, these are commonly used by users that do not want to download/install them later

See the latest news regarding CyanideL WIP

The weather panel whon/`t be hidden

The greeting will be shown after the device gets unlocked
The greeting will be shown only the first time the device gets unlocked after the boot
The greeting will never be shown
Enter a new text, which will be shown as greeting. An empty field will revert the text to:\n\'%s\'
Show a preview of the current used greeting text, which will be shown as greeting
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Enable to choose a number of visible notification icons to hide the Cyanide logo on the status bar
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution & only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.

Selected files are being deleted, please wait.
All done! Reboot your device now.

Rearrange by dragging by the handle on the right. Remove by swiping.

To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available

Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time & date information

This will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
This will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar

Turn screen on when lid opens
You\'ve just unleashed the hidden poison
Long press lock icon to launch torch

If disabled, a connection to google servers is not required in order to detect data connection.
